titleStmt.title: The lavviers question The answere to the lawiers question. The censure of Christ vpon the answere. By Henry Smith.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by J. Danter] for Thomas Gosson: and are to be sold at his shop by London Bridge Gate,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and publication date from STC.
D1 is a separate title page, with same imprint and printer's device, reading: The lavvgivers ansvver to the lavviers question.
H1 is a separate title page, with same imprint and printer's device, reading: The censure of Christ vpon the ansvvere.
Identified as STC 22679a on UMI microfilm.
Some print faded and show-through; pages marked, stained and torn.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
